We know not when our Master will come to settle the account of His servants; therefore we are to be constantly prepared to meet Him in peace. The probation of anyone of us may cease in a moment. Death by accident may suddenly and unexpectedly close our earthly period. How stands the life record of 


                                   - 85 - 

each one of us today? To every man God has given his work, the very work which the Master would have each to do.
